text: Early Access ProgramIntelliJ IDEA 2025.1 Release Candidate Is Out!  IntelliJ IDEA 2025.1 Release Candidate is available for download, so we’re one step away from the major release! You can get the latest build from our website, through the free Toolbox App, or via snaps for Ubuntu. To use this build, an active subscription to IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate is required. Download IntelliJ IDEA 2025.1 RC We’re wrapping up the Early Access Program, and we’d like to thank everyone who participated and shared their valuable feedback on the new features and improvements introduced during this development cycle. Your input has been incredibly helpful! For an overview of the latest additions to the IDE, check out the 2025.1 EAP section of our blog. You can also find the full list of recent updates in the release notes. If you encounter any issues, please report them via our issue tracker. Your feedback is essential – feel free to share your thoughts on the latest updates by reaching out to us on X or leaving a comment below. Subscribe to IntelliJ IDEA Blog updates
html:
Early Access Program

IntelliJ IDEA 2025.1 Release Candidate Is Out! 

IntelliJ IDEA 2025.1 Release Candidate is available for download, so we’re one step away from the major release!

You can get the latest build from our website, through the free Toolbox App, or via snaps for Ubuntu.

To use this build, an active subscription to IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate is required.

Download IntelliJ IDEA 2025.1 RC

We’re wrapping up the Early Access Program, and we’d like to thank everyone who participated and shared their valuable feedback on the new features and improvements introduced during this development cycle. Your input has been incredibly helpful!

For an overview of the latest additions to the IDE, check out the 2025.1 EAP section of our blog. You can also find the full list of recent updates in the release notes.

If you encounter any issues, please report them via our issue tracker. Your feedback is essential – feel free to share your thoughts on the latest updates by reaching out to us on X or leaving a comment below.

Subscribe to IntelliJ IDEA Blog updates
